DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effective exercise protocol chronic low back pain patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Lumbar Stabilization Exercise Gait Training Lower Back Muscles- Electromyographic ( EMG ) Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: - Design : Prospective study - Setting : hospital rehabilitation department - Intervention : Participants randomly assign 4 different exercise group : flexibility exercise , brace exercise + stabilization exercise group , brace exercise+ walk exercise group bracing+ walk + stabilization exercise group - Main outcome measure : Numeric rating scale ( NRS ) , Oswestry disability index Peak torque lumbar extensor surface electromyography Time duration capability maintenance posture
DOC.criteria: Age > 20 Who suffer low back pain 3 month . Pregnancy Under 20yearold Who significant neurologic deficit Who experience spine operation Who walk
